similar_issues.title: [PrepareForEmission] Crash when inout operations are passed to instance ports

recommendation_reason: While #8283 describes the same underlying issue (string type not supported in MooreToCore), it focuses on string variables. This crash specifically involves string-typed MODULE PORTS which may be a distinct code path. The dyn_cast assertion in ModulePortInfo/sanitizeInOut is a specific manifestation not covered by existing issues. Consider referencing #8283 as related.
